name: gams.vim
summary: Simple syntax highlighting for GAMS modelling software (www.gams.com)
description: As far as I know, there is no syntax highlighting for GAMS modeling language in vim. Here goes one, works with gvim. No other functionality, just the highlighting.
install_details:
Put

au BufEnter *.gms set ft=gams

in your .vimrc, or run 

set ft=gams

after opening your .gms file.
